value.name: Savage Glascock: Orange Grove And The Wonder Years
value.description: I laughed like the dickens. Another black guy I loved was Joe Cody. Joe liked to go shirtless and he was fond of Jack Webb, the cop actor. He was very black and I'd ask him to do "Dragnet."

value.name: Charles E. Kane
value.description: Katelynn Salyards (Joe), Cody Snyder (Emily), Jesse Snyder, Tyler Kane, Levi Kane, Jena Kane, Charley Bradford and Nora Bradford; 10 great-grandchildren: Cheyenne Salyards, Liliana Salyards ...
